titles.title: To allow the Miami Tribe of Oklahoma to lease or transfer certain lands.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Indian, Insular and Alaska Native Affairs.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Subcommittee on Indian, Insular and Alaska Native Affairs Discharged.

committee.subcommittee: Indian, Insular and Alaska Native Affairs
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary: 1/22/2015--Introduced. Allows the Miami Tribe of Oklahoma to lease, sell, convey, warrant, or transfer all or any part of its interests in any real property that is not held in trust by the United States for the tribe.
